name: Orange (Cheese490)
description:
"It's been a while since you last got this far. 

It's been quite the show, but I'm afraid I can't let you go any further."

-

You can't remember much, but you know for sure that you've got to get out of here.  Every single escape attempt has led you back to the start, but for some reason, you have a feeling that this time, things will be different.

Made with RPG Maker VX Ace for the 14th RPG Maker Horror Game Jam.

 -Link to the jam-

Download information and all that jazz:

  • To play this game, download the file and extract it. 
  • Then find the font file named 'Irritation' and install that. (This isn't necessary, but it looks better than the default font.)
  • Click the file called 'Game'
  • Only works on devices running Windows.
